title: Kinetics and Catalysis
additional-notes: This is an American edition (and possibly a translation) of a Russian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

There was a renewal filed in 1995 for a 1967 publication 'Kinetics and Catalysis' (Chemical engineering progress symposium series, vol. 63, no. 73).  We are not sure if that is part of this journal, but by this date copyright automatically renewed in any case.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
